input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: Looking for a way to improve your language skills? LangLang is the perfect app for you! Connect with teachers from all over the world and get started on your language learning journey today.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you're sure to find the perfect tutor for you.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn any language you want.
